entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016
